Reviews.Title: Disappointed.
Reviews.Author: Susan Vehue
Reviews.Content: I bought my camera early this year.. it's already broken. I haven't dropped it or anything. All thes udden there's this black circle I don't see on the screen, but in the pictures. It makes it look as though someones whole face is black and blue! And the shutter stopped fully opening and closing! Worst experience I've ever had with a camera.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: KUN
Reviews.Content: it's good deal. ship fast.and package well.and there are many items includedwhich can make great fun.it is so nice.
